mergeSort

public static <T extends java.lang.Comparable<? super T>> void mergeSort(T[] a,
                                                                         T[] tmpArray)
Recursive mergesort algorithm.

Parameters:
a - an array of Comparable items.
tmpArray - an array of Comparable items used as the temporary array for merging purpose

mergeSort

public static <T extends java.lang.Comparable<? super T>> void mergeSort(T[] a,
                                                                         T[] tmpArray,
                                                                         int cutoff)
Recursive nergesort , switch to insertionSort when size is smaller than or equal to cutoff parameter

Parameters:
a - an array of Comparable items.
tmpArray - an array of Comparable items used as the temporary array for merging purpose
cutoff - an integer used as the cutoff value, switch to insertionsort when size is smaller than or equal to this value.
